title: Consistently high ping after match starts
body: Recently, every game after about the 7 or 8 minute mark, my ping goes up from 40 to about 200, and begins to intermittently spike to values upward of 600 for the rest of the match. I hadn't played League in a few months, so I don't know during what patch this problem arose, but for the last week or two my ping has made playing anything competitive practically impossible.

replies.body:
Inconsistencies in your latency (ping) in-game are often caused by issues along your ISP routing to the server. Sometimes your local network settings can exacerbate this problem, so I recommend ensuring your local settings are up to spec by going through our connection [troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you still see issues after working through those steps.
